item.title: Claim Reward for voting
item.dc:creator: @runescapeftw1234 runescapeftw1234
item.description:
@runescapeftw1234 wrote:

[code][code=]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“check”) || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“reward”)) {
try {
VoteReward reward = Server.vote.hasVoted(c.playerName.replaceAll(" ", “_”));
if(reward != null){
switch(reward.getReward()){
case 0:
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2500000);
//
case 15332:
break;
case 1:
//etc

                    default:
                        c.sendMessage("Reward not found.");
                        break;
                }
                c.sendMessage("Thank you for voting.");
            } else {
                c.sendMessage("You have no items waiting for you.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e){
            c.sendMessage("[GTL Vote] A SQL error has occured.");
        }
    }[/code]

Hey, I’m kinda stuck and i really don’t know how to add this command to give an item when someone has voted, I would be grateful if someone could help me.

Read full topic
